MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Minffordd and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.03PM. Our engineers are on site repairing a fault on the network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.47PM on 12th November 2020.
